operation.expression:
let $bp := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_A_BusinessPartner[1], $cb := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_YY1_CreditBlock[1], $cc := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_A_CustomerCompany[1], $sa := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_A_CustomerSalesArea[1], $ep := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_A_EnterpriseProject[1], $pr := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_ChangeEntProjProcgStatus[1] return
(if ($temp.tmp_Flag_CreateBP = 1) then '^POST_A_BusinessPartner='||$bp/Error|| '^POST_YY1_CreditBlock='||$cb/Error else '') || (if ($temp.tmp_Flag_ExtendToCompany = 1 ) then '^POST_A_CustomerCompany='||$cc/Error|| '^POST_A_CustomerSalesArea='||$sa/Error else '') || (if ($temp.tmp_Flag_CreateProj = 1 ) then '^POST_A_EnterpriseProject='||$ep/Error|| '^POST_ChangeEntProjProcgStatus='||$pr/Error else '')

let $bp := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_A_BusinessPartner[1], $cb := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_YY1_CreditBlock[1], $cc := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_A_CustomerCompany[1], $sa := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_A_CustomerSalesArea[1], $ep := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_A_EnterpriseProject[1], $pr := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_ChangeEntProjProcgStatus[1] return
(if ($temp.tmp_Flag_CreateBP = 1) then '^POST_A_BusinessPartner='||$bp/Description|| '^POST_YY1_CreditBlock='||$cb/Description else '') || (if ($temp.tmp_Flag_ExtendToCompany = 1 ) then '^POST_A_CustomerCompany='||$cc/Description|| '^POST_A_CustomerSalesArea='||$sa/Description else '') || (if ($temp.tmp_Flag_CreateProj = 1 ) then '^POST_A_EnterpriseProject='||$ep/Description|| '^POST_ChangeEntProjProcgStatus='||$pr/Description else '')

if (fn:starts-with($output.out_BusinessPartnerTax_Array[1]/BPTaxType, 'FIELD:') or fn:string-length($output.out_BusinessPartnerTax_Array[1]/BPTaxNumber)=0 ) then () else ( <root xmlns:m="urn:informatica:ae:xquery:json2xml:meta-data"> <to_BusinessPartnerTax> { for $x in $output.out_BusinessPartnerTax_Array return <results m:isArray="true"> <BPTaxType>{$x/BPTaxType/text()}</BPTaxType> <BPTaxNumber>{$x/BPTaxNumber/text()}</BPTaxNumber> </results> } </to_BusinessPartnerTax> </root>)

<root xmlns:m="urn:informatica:ae:xquery:json2xml:meta-data"> <AuthorizationGroup>0001</AuthorizationGroup> <BusinessPartnerCategory>{$output.out_EntityDetails[1]/RefType}</BusinessPartnerCategory> <BusinessPartner>{$output.out_EntityDetails[1]/RefCode} </BusinessPartner> <Language>{$output.out_EntityDetails[1]/Language} </Language> <CorrespondenceLanguage>{$output.out_EntityDetails[1]/Language} </CorrespondenceLanguage> <BusinessPartnerGrouping>BP03</BusinessPartnerGrouping> <OrganizationBPName1>{$output.out_EntityDetails[1]/OrganizationBPName1 }</OrganizationBPName1> <OrganizationBPName2>{$output.out_EntityDetails[1]/OrganizationBPName2 }</OrganizationBPName2> <OrganizationBPName3>{$output.out_EntityDetails[1]/OrganizationBPName3 }</OrganizationBPName3> <OrganizationBPName4>{$output.out_EntityDetails[1]/OrganizationBPName4 }</OrganizationBPName4> <SearchTerm1>{$output.out_BusinessPartnerTax_Array[1]/BPTaxNumber/text() }</SearchTerm1> <SearchTerm2>{$output.out_BusinessPartnerTax_Array[2]/BPTaxNumber/text() }</SearchTerm2> <FirstName>{$output.out_EntityDetails[1]/FirstName }</FirstName> <LastName>{$output.out_EntityDetails[1]/LastName }</LastName> <BusinessPartnerIDByExtSystem>{$output.out_EntityDetails[1]/AltName}</BusinessPartnerIDByExtSystem> {$temp.tmp_Address_BP_PO/element()} {$temp.tmp_BusinessPartnerTax_PO/element()} { if(not(util:isNull($output.out_EntityDetails[1]/AddrNr ))) then ( <to_Customer> <to_CustomerCompany> <results m:isArray="true"> <Customer>{$output.out_EntityDetails[1]/RefCode}</Customer> <CompanyCode>{$temp.tmp_CompanyCode}</CompanyCode> <ReconciliationAccount>12100000</ReconciliationAccount> <YY1_Customer_Segment_cco>{$output.out_Segment }</YY1_Customer_Segment_cco> <ValueAdjustmentKey>Z1</ValueAdjustmentKey> <PaymentTerms>{$output.out_EntityDetails[1]/PaytermTag }</PaymentTerms> <AccountingClerkInternetAddress>{ if(not(util:isNull($output.out_EntityDetails[1]/EmailInvoiceReminder))) then ($output.out_EntityDetails[1]/EmailInvoiceReminder) else ( $output.out_EntityDetails[1]/EmailOther )} </AccountingClerkInternetAddress> <CashPlanningGroup>{$temp.tmp_CashPlanningGroup }</CashPlanningGroup> </results> </to_CustomerCompany> <to_CustomerSalesArea> <results m:isArray="true"> <Customer>{$output.out_EntityDetails[1]/RefCode}</Customer> <SalesOrganization>{$temp.tmp_CompanyCode}</SalesOrganization> <DistributionChannel>10</DistributionChannel> <Division>10</Division> <Currency>{$output.out_Currency}</Currency> <CustomerPaymentTerms>{$output.out_EntityDetails[1]/PaytermTag}</CustomerPaymentTerms> </results> </to_CustomerSalesArea> </to_Customer> ) else()} { if(not(util:isNull($output.out_EntityDetails[1]/AddrNr ))) then ( <to_BusinessPartnerRole> <results> <BusinessPartnerRole>FLCU00</BusinessPartnerRole> <ValidFrom>{fn:current-dateTime()}</ValidFrom> <ValidTo>{date:toDate('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')}</ValidTo> </results> <results> <BusinessPartnerRole>UDM000</BusinessPartnerRole> <ValidFrom>{fn:current-dateTime()}</ValidFrom> <ValidTo>{date:toDate('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')}</ValidTo> </results> <results> <BusinessPartnerRole>UKM000</BusinessPartnerRole> <ValidFrom>{fn:current-dateTime()}</ValidFrom> <ValidTo>{date:toDate('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')}</ValidTo> </results> <results> <BusinessPartnerRole>FLCU01</BusinessPartnerRole> <ValidFrom>{fn:current-dateTime()}</ValidFrom> <ValidTo>{date:toDate('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')}</ValidTo> </results> </to_BusinessPartnerRole> ) else()} </root>

subflow.title: Create Initial Credit Block in SAP
Extend BP to new Customer Company
Extend BP to new Customer Sales Area

parameter.name: in_ParentMessage
parameter.expression: util:iif(($output.O_SUBP_Flag = 'N'), 'Warning: The specified Project Manager does not exist as a Business Partner in SAP - the Project has been created without a Project Manager;','')
